poem:
**Seize the Moment**

In the roar of the crowd,
a whisper —
green earth dreams,
fingers of light touch
the promise of breath,
a future 
etched in cloud and leaf,
Kamala stand firm,
the wind, a choir,
don't just sing,
shout 
for rivers, forests, skies—
our world 
waiting to breathe.
